00039 /** @defgroup USBDDescriptor USB Descriptor
00040   * @brief USB descriptor
00041   * @{
00042   */
00043 
00044 
00045 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 /* USB Device descriptor setting                                                                            */
00047 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00048 // <h> USB Device descriptor setting
00049 //   <o0> USB Specification Release number (bcdUSB)
00050 //      <0x0200=> USB 2.0
00051 //      <0x0110=> USB 1.1
00052 //      <0x0100=> USB 1.0
00053 //   <o1> USB Class code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00054 //      <0x00=> Use class information in the Interface Descriptors (0x00)
00055 //      <0x02=> Communications and CDC Control (CDC, 0x02)
00056 //      <0xDC=> Diagnostic Device (0xDC)
00057 //      <0xEF=> Miscellaneous (0xEF)
00058 //      <0xFF=> Vendor Specific (0xFF)
00059 //   <o2> USB Subclass code (assigned by the USB-IF) <0x0-0xFF:1>
00060 //   <o3> USB Protocol code (assigned by the USB-IF) <0x0-0xFF:1>
00061 //   <o4> USB Vendor ID <0x0-0xFFFF:1>
00062 //   <o5> USB Product ID <0x0-0xFFFF:1>
00063 //   <o6> USB Device Version <0x0-0xFFFF:1>
00064 //   <o7.0> USB String descriptor - Manufacturer
00065 //   <o8.0> USB String descriptor - Product
00066 //   <o9.0> USB String descriptor - Device serial number
00067 //   <o10> USB Number of possible configurations <0-255:1>
00068 #define DESC_BCDUSB               (0x0110)
00069 #define DESC_BDEVCLASS            (0x00)
00070 #define DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS         (0x00)
00071 #define DESC_BDEVPROTOCOL         (0x00)
00072 #define DESC_IDVENDOR             (0x04D9)
00073 #define DESC_IDPRODUCT            (0x8008)
00074 #define DESC_BCDDEVICE            (0x0100)
00075 #define DESC_IMANUFACTURE         (1)
00076 #define DESC_IPRODUCT             (1)
00077 #define DESC_ISERIALNUM           (1)
00078 #define DESC_INUMCONFN            (1)
00079 // </h>
00080 
00081 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00082 /* USB Device Descriptor definition. DO NOT MODIFY.                                                         */
00083 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00084 #if (DESC_BDEVCLASS == 0x0 & DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS != 0x0)
00085 #error "DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS must be reset to zero when the DESC_BDEVCLASS is equal to zero."
00086 #endif
00087 #define DESC_WMAXPACKETSIZE0      (_EP0LEN)
00088 #define DESC_STR_MAN              (1 * DESC_IMANUFACTURE)
00089 #define DESC_STR_PRD              (2 * DESC_IPRODUCT)
00090 #define DESC_STR_SER              (3 * DESC_ISERIALNUM)
00091 #define DESC_NUM_STRING           (1 + 3)
00092 
00093 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00094 /* USB Device descriptor                                                                                    */
00095 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00096 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_DeviceDesc[] =
00097 {
00098   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00099   /* Device descriptor                                                                                      */
00100   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00101                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00102                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00103   DESC_LEN_DEV,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00104   DESC_TYPE_01_DEV,           // bDescriptorType     1 DEVICE Descriptor Type
00105   DESC_H2B(DESC_BCDUSB),      // bcdUSB              2 USB Specification Release Number
00106   DESC_BDEVCLASS,             // bDeviceClass        1 Class code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00107   DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS,          // bDeviceSubClass     1 Subclass code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00108   DESC_BDEVPROTOCOL,          // bDeviceProtocol     1 Protocol code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00109   DESC_WMAXPACKETSIZE0,       // wMaxPacketSize0     1 Maximum packet size for endpoint zero
00110   DESC_H2B(DESC_IDVENDOR),    // idVendor            2 Vendor ID (assigned by USB-IF)
00111   DESC_H2B(DESC_IDPRODUCT),   // idProduct           2 Product ID (assigned by manufacturer)
00112   DESC_H2B(DESC_BCDDEVICE),   // bcdDevice           2 Device release number
00113   DESC_STR_MAN,               // iManufacturer       1 Index of string descriptor (Manufacturer)
00114   DESC_STR_PRD,               // iProduct            1 Index of string descriptor (Product)
00115   DESC_STR_SER,               // iSerialNumber       1 Index of string descriptor (Serial Number)
00116   DESC_INUMCONFN,             // iNumConfigurations  1 Number of possible configuration
00117 };
00118 
00119 
00120 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00121 /* USB Configuration descriptor setting                                                                     */
00122 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00123 // <h> USB Configuration descriptor setting
00124 //   <o0.0> Self-powered
00125 //     <i> Bit 6 of bmAttributes
00126 //   <o1.0> Remote Wakeup
00127 //     <i> Bit 5 of bmAttributes
00128 //   <o2> USB Device maximum power (mA) < 2-512:2>
00129 #define DESC_BMATTR_SELF_POWER        (0)
00130 #define DESC_BMATTR_REMOTE_WAKEUP     (1)
00131 #define DESC_BMAXPOWER                (100)
00132 // </h>
00133 
00134 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00135 /* USB Configuration Descriptor definition. DO NOT MODIFY.                                                  */
00136 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00137 #define DESC_BMATTRIBUTES        (0x80 | (DESC_BMATTR_SELF_POWER << 6) | (DESC_BMATTR_REMOTE_WAKEUP << 5))
00138 #define DESC_TOTAL_LEN           DESC_H2B((DESC_LEN_CONFN_T + RETARGET_DLEN))
00139 
00140 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00141 /* USB Configuration Descriptor                                                                             */
00142 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00143 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_ConfnDesc[] =
00144 {
00145   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00146   /* Configuration descriptor                                                                               */
00147   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00148                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00149                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00150   DESC_LEN_CONFN,             // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00151   DESC_TYPE_02_CONFN,         // bDescriptorType     1 CONFIGURATION Descriptor Type
00152   DESC_TOTAL_LEN,             // wTotalLength        2 Total length of data returned for this configuration
00153   0x01 + RETARGET_INF,        // bNumberInterface    1 Number of interfaces supported by this configuration
00154   0x01,                       // bConfigurationValue 1 Value to use as an argument to the SetConfiguration()
00155   0x00,                       // iConfiguration      1 Index of string descriptor describing this configuration
00156   DESC_BMATTRIBUTES,          // bmAttributes        1 Configuration characteristics
00157                               //                        D6: Self-powered, D5: RemoteWakeup
00158   DESC_POWER(DESC_BMAXPOWER), // bMaxPower           1 Maximum power consumption of the USB device (2 mA units)
00159 
00160   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00161   /* Interface descriptor                                                                                   */
00162   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00163                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00164                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00165   DESC_LEN_INF,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00166   DESC_TYPE_04_INF,           // bDescriptorType     1 INTERFACE Descriptor Type
00167   0x00,                       // bInterfaceNumber    1 Number of this interface (Zero-based 0)
00168   0x00,                       // bAlternateSetting   1 Value used to select this alternate setting
00169   2,                          // bNumEndpoints       1 Number of endpoints used by this interface
00170   CLASS_INF_CLASS,            // bInterfaceClass     1 Class code (assigned by USB-IF)
00171   CLASS_INF_SUBCLASS,         // bInterfaceSubClass  1 Subclass code (assigned by USB-IF)
00172   CLASS_INF_PTCO,             // bInterfaceProtocol  1 Protocol code (assigned by USB)
00173   0x00,                       // iInterface          1 Index of string descriptor describing this interface
00174 
00175   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00176   /* XXX descriptor                                                                                         */
00177   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00178                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00179                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00180   DESC_LEN_XXX,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00181   DESC_TYPE_01_XXX,           // bDescriptorType     1 XXX Descriptor type
00182   DESC_H2B(0x0110),           // bcdXXX              2 XXX Specification Release Number
00183   0x21,                       // bCountryCode        1 Country code of the localized hardware
00184   0x01,                       // bNumDescriptors     1 Number of class descriptors (at least 1)
00185   DESC_TYPE_02_XXX,           // bDescriptorType     1 REPORT Descriptor Type
00186   DESC_H2B(DESC_LEN_XXXX),    // bDescriptorLength   2 Total size of the Report descriptor
00187 
00188   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00189   /* Endpoint                                                                                               */
00190   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00191                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00192                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00193   DESC_LEN_EPT,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00194   DESC_TYPE_05_EPT,           // bDescriptorType     1 ENDPOINT Descriptor Type
00195   0x81,                       // bEndpointAddress    1 The address of the endpoint
00196                               //                        Bit 3..0: The endpoint number
00197                               //                        Bit 6..4: Reserved
00198                               //                        Bit 7   : Direction (0 = Out/1 = In)
00199   0x03,                       // bmAttribute         1 Endpoint Attribute
00200                               //                        Bit 1..0: Transfer type
00201                               //                                  00 = Control
00202                               //                                  01 = Isochronous
00203                               //                                  10 = Bulk
00204                               //                                  11 = Interrupt
00205                               //                        All other reserved
00206   DESC_H2B(_EP1LEN),          // wMaxPacketSize      2 Maximum packet size
00207   0x01,                       // bInterval           1 Interval for polling endpoint
00208 
00209   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00210   /* Endpoint                                                                                               */
00211   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00212                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00213                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00214   DESC_LEN_EPT,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00215   DESC_TYPE_05_EPT,           // bDescriptorType     1 ENDPOINT Descriptor Type
00216   0x02,                       // bEndpointAddress    1 The address of the endpoint
00217                               //                        Bit 3..0: The endpoint number
00218                               //                        Bit 6..4: Reserved
00219                               //                        Bit 7   : Direction (0 = Out/1 = In)
00220   0x03,                       // bmAttribute         1 Endpoint Attribute
00221                               //                        Bit 1..0: Transfer type
00222                               //                                  00 = Control
00223                               //                                  01 = Isochronous
00224                               //                                  10 = Bulk
00225                               //                                  11 = Interrupt
00226                               //                        All other reserved
00227   DESC_H2B(_EP2LEN),          // wMaxPacketSize      2 Maximum packet size
00228   0x01,                       // bInterval           1 Interval for polling endpoint
00229 
00230   #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00231     #include "ht32_retarget_desc.h"
00232   #endif
00233 
00234 };
00235 
00236 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00237 /* USB String Descriptor                                                                                    */
00238 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00239 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_StringDescLANGID[] =
00240 {
00241   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00242   /* LANGID (Index = 0)                                                                                     */
00243   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00244                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00245                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00246   DESC_STRLEN(1),             // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00247   DESC_TYPE_03_STR,           // bDescriptorType     1 STRING Descriptor Type
00248   DESC_H2B(0x0409),           // wLANGID[0]          2 LANGID code zero
00249 };
00250 
00251 #if (DESC_IMANUFACTURE == 1)
00252 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_StringDescManufacture[] =
00253 {
00254   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00255   /* Manufacture (Index = 1)                                                                                */
00256   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00257                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00258                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00259   DESC_STRLEN(6),             // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00260   DESC_TYPE_03_STR,           // bDescriptorType     1 STRING Descriptor Type
00261   DESC_CHAR('H'),             // bString             N UNICODE encoded string
00262   DESC_CHAR('O'),
00263   DESC_CHAR('L'),
00264   DESC_CHAR('T'),
00265   DESC_CHAR('E'),
00266   DESC_CHAR('K'),
00267 };
00268 #endif
00269 
00270 #if (DESC_IPRODUCT == 1)
00271 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_StringDescProduct[] =
00272 {
00273   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00274   /* Product (Index = 2)                                                                                    */
00275   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00276                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00277                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00278   DESC_STRLEN(12),            // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00279   DESC_TYPE_03_STR,           // bDescriptorType     1 STRING Descriptor Type
00280   DESC_CHAR('U'),             // bString             N UNICODE encoded string
00281   DESC_CHAR('S'),
00282   DESC_CHAR('B'),
00283   DESC_CHAR('-'),
00284   DESC_CHAR('X'),
00285   DESC_CHAR('X'),
00286   DESC_CHAR('X'),
00287   DESC_CHAR(' '),
00288   DESC_CHAR('D'),
00289   DESC_CHAR('E'),
00290   DESC_CHAR('M'),
00291   DESC_CHAR('O'),
00292 };
00293 #endif
00294 
00295 
00296 #if (DESC_ISERIALNUM == 1)
00297 __ALIGN4 static u8 guUSB_StringDescSerialNum[] =
00298 {
00299   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00300   /* Serial Number (Index = 3)                                                                              */
00301   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00302                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00303                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00304   DESC_STRLEN(12),            // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00305   DESC_TYPE_03_STR,           // bDescriptorType     1 STRING Descriptor Type
00306   DESC_CHAR('S'),             // bString             N UNICODE encoded string
00307   DESC_CHAR('N'),
00308   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00309   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00310   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00311   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00312   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00313   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00314   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00315   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00316   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00317   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00318 };
00319 #endif
00320 
00321 uc8 *gpStringDesc[DESC_NUM_STRING] =
00322 {
00323 
00324   guUSB_StringDescLANGID,
00325 
00326   #if (DESC_IMANUFACTURE == 1)
00327   guUSB_StringDescManufacture,
00328   #else
00329   NULL,
00330   #endif
00331 
00332   #if (DESC_IPRODUCT == 1)
00333   guUSB_StringDescProduct,
00334   #else
00335   NULL,
00336   #endif
00337 
00338   #if (DESC_ISERIALNUM == 1)
00339   guUSB_StringDescSerialNum
00340   #else
00341   NULL,
00342   #endif
00343 
00344 };
00345 
00346 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00347   * @brief  USB Descriptor pointer initialization.
00348   * @param  pDesc: pointer of USBDCore_Desc_TypeDef
00349   * @retval None
00350   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00351 void USBDDesc_Init(USBDCore_Desc_TypeDef *pDesc)
00352 {
00353   pDesc->pDeviceDesc = guUSB_DeviceDesc;
00354   pDesc->pConfnDesc = guUSB_ConfnDesc;
00355   pDesc->ppStringDesc = gpStringDesc;
00356   pDesc->uStringDescNumber = DESC_NUM_STRING;
00357 
00358   return;
00359 }
